Title: Parallel Copy
Description: This Application Allows You To Copy From A Source To Multiple Destinations. The Algorithm Is Independent From CLR Machine But Can Be Heavy When Executed.
HomeWiki:
Introduction
This WPF Application and Library (C#.NET) Allows you to copy a file or folder from a Source To Multiple Destinations simultaneously without losing Transfer Bandwidth (Unlike the available functions). The only downturn of this method is that it uses a considerable amount of RAM.

I must Inform you that this program doesn't use "File.Copy" function. Here You can see the flow chart: Parallel Copy Flow Chart

There are ClickOnce setup for Application, Application Sources and a Library For Parallel Copying in downloads sections.
